trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Isto deixa-lhe tirar e carregar fotos.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Os websites que visita poderão solicitar a sua localização.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Isto deixa-lhe tirar e carregar vídeos.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Isto deixa-lhe guardar e carregar fotos.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: Limpe o seu histórico de sessão de navegação inteiro, palavras-passe, cookies a qualquer altura com um simples toque.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.
Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: À procura de algo diferente? Escolha um motor de pesquisa diferente.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: A sua pesquisa, à sua maneira
trans-unit.note: Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.
Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: Leve a navegação privada ao próximo nível. Bloqueie anúncios e outro conteúdo que pode monitorizá-lo(a) através de sites e tornar o carregamento de páginas lento.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: O %@ é produzido pela Mozilla. A nossa missão é fomentar uma Internet aberta e saudável.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Apague para eliminar cookies bem como o histórico de pesquisa e navegação
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for the onboarding screen version 2.
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen
Text for a label that indicates the title of the bottom button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: We clear your history when you close the app for extra privacy.
trans-unit.target: Para uma privacidade adicional, limpamos o seu histórico quando fecha a aplicação.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the first subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Make %@ your default to protect your data with every link you open.
trans-unit.target: Predefina o %@ para proteger os seus dados com cada ligação que abrir.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the second subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.target: O %@ não é como os outros navegadores
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title of the top button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Erase your browsing history, passwords, cookies, and prevent unwanted ads from following you in a simple click!
trans-unit.target: Apague o seu histórico de navegação, palavras-passe, cookies e evite que anúncios indesejados o(a) sigam com um simples clique!
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.target: O seu histórico não o(a) segue
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking.
trans-unit.target: O %@ é um navegador de privacidade dedicado com proteção contra rastreamento e bloqueio de anúncios.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of incognito section from onboarding screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title of incognito section from onboarding screen.
Used as a text for the link in Onboarding.PrivacyNotice.Text.

trans-unit.source: Firefox cares about your privacy. Read more in %@.
trans-unit.target: O Firefox preocupa-se com a sua privacidade. Saiba mais em %@.
trans-unit.note: Text that describes Firefox's commitment to privacy. %@ is a link using Onboarding.PrivacyNotice.LinkText as text.

trans-unit.source: Configure settings so you can decide how much or how little you share.
trans-unit.target: Defina as configurações para poder decidir quanto ou quão pouco partilha.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of protection section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of protection section from onboarding screen.

Title for the Terms of Use screen during onboarding. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Label for search suggestions prompt message

Text for a label that indicates the description for share trackers tip. %@ is the number of trackers blocked. Only shown when there are more than 10 trackers blocked. For locales where we would need plural support, please feel free to translate this string as `Trackers blocked so far: %@` instead.
Text for a label that indicates the title for share trackers tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.target: Selecione Adicionar aos atalhos no menu do %@
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for shortcuts tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Create shortcuts to the sites you visit most:
trans-unit.target: Crie atalhos para os sites que mais visita:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for shortcuts tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri erase tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri erase tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri favorite tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri favorite tip.

trans-unit.target: Experimente desativar a Proteção contra a monitorização
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Site missing content or acting strange?
trans-unit.target: Falta conteúdo ou o site está a ter um comportamento estranho?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for sites not working tip.
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: Aceda às Definições para gerir as opções específicas de privacidade e segurança.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: Estas configurações padrão oferecem uma proteção forte. Mas é fácil ajustar as configurações para cumprir com as suas necessidades específicas.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Start your private browsing session, and we’ll block trackers and other bad stuff as you go.
trans-unit.target: Comece a sua sessão de navegação privada e bloquearemos rastreadores e outras coisas más à medida que navega.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Search Bar tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: O %@ impediu que fosse espiado/a por este site. Toque no escudo para obter informações sobre o que bloqueámos.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Got ‘em! We stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield any time to see what we’re blocking.
trans-unit.target: Foram apanhados! Impedimos que este site o/a espiasse. Toque no escudo a qualquer momento para ver o que estamos a bloquear.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip when we block trackers for the first time on a website

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: Toque no lixo a qualquer momento para remover todos os vestígios da sua sessão atual.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: Tap here to trash it all — history, cookies, everything — and start fresh on a new tab.
trans-unit.target: Toque aqui para mandar tudo para o lixo — histórico, cookies, tudo — e recomeçar num novo separador.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip
This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Content blocking and tracking protection from Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Bloqueio de conteúdo e proteção contra a monitorização da Mozilla
trans-unit.note: Human readable description

trans-unit.source: Add a %@ shortcut to your Home screen. After adding the widget, touch and hold to edit it and select a different shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Adicione um atalho do %@ ao seu ecrã inicial. Depois de adicionar o widget, faça um toque longo para o editar e selecione um atalho diferente.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Start a private search in %@ with your default search engine.
trans-unit.target: Inicie uma pesquisa privada em %@ com o seu motor de pesquisa predefinido.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).
Quick Actions title when widget enters edit mode
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).
